paper_abstract: Consider a matrix valued function A(x) is an element of R(mxn), m >= n, smoothly depending on parameters x is an element of Omega subset of R(2), where Omega is simply connected and bounded. We consider a technique to locate parameter values where some of the q dominant (q <= n) singular values of A coalesce, in the specific case when A is large and m > n >> q. (C) 2010 IMACS. Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Locating coalescing singular values of large two-parameter matrices
